caffeine.name: Caffeine
caffeine.description: A central nervous system stimulant of the methylxanthine class.

aspirin.name: Aspirin
aspirin.description: A medication used to reduce pain, fever, and inflammation.

penicillin.name: Penicillin G
penicillin.description: The first antibiotic to be widely used.

graphene.name: Graphene Fragment
graphene.description: A simple fragment of graphene, a material with remarkable properties.

glucose.name: Glucose

adrenaline.name: Adrenaline
adrenaline.description: A hormone and neurotransmitter involved in the fight-or-flight response.
